text: Munaphikara muminaderake deke jijnesa karabe, ‘amara ki tomadera sange chilama na?’ Tara balabe, ‘hyam, kintu tomara nijera'i nijederake bipadagrasta karecha. Ara tomara pratiksa karechile, sandeha posana karechile ebam alika akankha tomaderake mohacchanna kare rekhechila, abasese allahara hukuma asala [1]. Ara mahaprataraka [2] tomaderake pratarita karechila allaha samparke.’
